RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 14100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KHOPILOT stalked the early pace, rallied three wide through the far turn, drifted in at the quarter pole, matched strides through the stretch three then two wide and proved best in a stiff drive. WELLER ROGUE allowed to settle, loomed boldly along the rail into the stretch then couldn't handle the winner. SILVER MATT pressed the pace along the inside then two wide until mid stretch, altered course three wide near the sixteenth pole and was outfinished. CATCHING MAGIC moved up four wide on the far turn then failed to sustain that bid. PRETTY LOUD passed tiring rivals. SOUPER PRONTO had good early speed along the inside then faded. INGERSOLL away alertly, set the pace into the far turn, checked between horses at the quarter pole when in tight and dropped out of it. PASION AZTECA was through after a half. THS STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND THE RIDER OF INGERSOLL LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDERS OF KHOPILOT AND SILVER MATT FOR INTERFERENCE AT THE QUARTER POLE. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS DISQUALIFIED KHOPILOT AND PLACED HIM SEVENTH. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION THE SEVEN EIGHTHS TIME WAS UNAVAILABLE.

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Khopilot
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked early, rallied 3 wide 2nd turn, drifted in 1/4p, all out,

ENTRY.NAME: Weller Rogue
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, loomed boldly rail, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Matt
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside, 2w, shifted out late, outfinished 3wide

ENTRY.NAME: Catching Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 4 wide, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Ingersoll
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 2nd turn, checked between 1/4p, claimed foul

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 39. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLAG RAISER sprinted to the lead soon after the start, set all the pace and widened through the stretch under brisk handling to win as much the best. FABULOUS CLOWN pressured the winner from the three path into the turn, drifted to the five path then was no match while second best. MUSIC GEM unhurried early, found his best stride late two wide. PEDAL TO DA KETTLE passed tiring rivals. SOMETHING ON TAP stalked the pace along the inside into the stretch then faded late. WHY KENNY WHY was through early. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION FRACTIONAL TIMES WERE UNAVAILABLE. FINAL TIME WAS HAND TIMED. FRACTIONS ADDED AND FINAL TIME CHANGED UPON REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: Pedal to Da Kettle
ENTRY.OWNER: Barker Scott W and Barker Carol

ENTRY.NAME: Flag Raiser
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, full of run, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Fabulous Clown
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, drifted 5path turn, no match for winner,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 14300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NIGHT TIME RULER broke in front, was throttled down on the clubhouse turn, set all the pace and widened through the stretch under mild urging to win as much the best. JOE BRRRR trailed early, rallied along the inside through the stretch and finished clear for second. ICON chased the winner two wide into the stretch, drifted out and was outfinished. THE WILD FLYER passed tiring rivals. DUDLEY chased the winner along the inside and was through after a half. VALHALLA AIR BASE stalked the early pace three widen then faltered. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION THE SEVEN EIGHTHS TIME WAS UNAVAILABLE.

ENTRY.NAME: Night Time Ruler
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, full of run, much the best,

ENTRY.NAME: Joe Brrrr
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, late rally, inside, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 33700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 6 Allowed 2 lbs. (Rac es Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUMBLE STRIP RON sprinted to the lead soon after the start, set all the pace and finished full of run to win going away under confident handling. CHOCOLATE PHILLING never far back, split horses two wide past the quarter pole and finished clear for second. TURNING PAGES vied for the lead along the inside into the stretch and was outfinished. DYNAMITE CLOUD chased the winner two wide in the four path into the stretch then faded. BUCKEYE RED had good early speed three wide while racing in the five path and was through after a half. WHISKEY HELPS trailed. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION THE FIVE EIGHTHS TIME WAS UNAVAILABLE.

ENTRY.NAME: Rumble Strip Ron
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick lead, set pace, responded right handed urging, going away

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Pick View LLC, Paul W. Schaffer & William D. Pickerrell

ENTRY.NAME: Chocolate Philling
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, split horses 1/4 pole, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Buckeye Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, 3 wide, 5path, through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 77. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CODE VIOLATION was bumped at the start, allowed to settle, closed willingly two wide through the far turn, drifted out to the seven path, made the lead in deep stretch and proved best under right handed urging. SUCCEED unhurried early, swung wide entering the stretch, loomed boldly in the eight path before the furlong marker and finished second best. ONE FOR THE MONEY trailed into the stretch then found his best stride late two wide. BLUNDER offered a mild bid three wide on the far turn, drifted out to the seven path entering the stretch then weakened. GREEN MILLENNIUM failed to menace. WAITES KINGDOM bore in at the start bumping the winner, battled for the lead two wide into the far turn, shook clear, set the pace into the stretch then came up empty. BON DEUX contested the lead along the inside into the far turn then flattened out. KNIGHTLY MISCHIEF inside, was through after a half. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION THE SEVEN EIGHTHS TIME WAS UNAVAILABLE.

ENTRY.NAME: Code Violation
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, closed willingly 5path, proved best, right urging

ENTRY.NAME: Waites Kingdom
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, dueled 2 wide, shook clear 2nd turn, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Succeed
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, swung wide, loomed boldly 8path, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 77. Starter Allowance Purse 23700. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 6 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Multiple Winners For A Claiming Price Of $8,000 Or More In 2022 - 2023 Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAT'S RHYTHM away alertly, pressed the pace two then three wide into the stretch, responded under right handed urging to make the lead before the furlong marker, drew off and was taken in hand late. APPEALING SENORITA stalked the pace two wide into the turn, dropped back, came on again late four wide and finished second best. GAIL'S DANCER away alertly, set a pressured pace two wide into the stretch then was outfinished. GRIZABELLA never far back, offered a strong bid along the rail into the stretch then came up empty. CUT RATES trailed into the stretch, swung wide and passed tiring rivals. CATABOUT stalked the pace from the six path into the stretch then weakened. CHLOES ANGEL had good early speed seven wide and was through after a half. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION THE FIVE EIGHTHS TIME WAS UNAVAILABLE.

ENTRY.NAME: Grizabella
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rail bid, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Gail's Dancer
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, outfinished 2 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Appealing Senorita
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 2 wide, dropped back turn, came again, 4 wide,second best

ENTRY.NAME: Cat's Rhythm
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, pressed 2-3wide, responded, drew off, in hand late

ENTRY.NAME: Cut Rates
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, passed tiring rivals,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Purse 35100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 6 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowa nces).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOLD N SILVER dueled for the lead two wide into the turn, assumed command, shook clear when put to a right handed whip in upper stretch and prevailed under confident handling. COWTOWN BOSS battled with the winner along the inside into the turn, dropped back, altered course to the six path entering the stretch giving up ground then finished determinedly while clear for second. DERBY INCLUDED offered a bid three wide into the stretch then leveled off in the six path. THAT'S THE WAY trailed into the stretch then passed tiring rivals three wide. COUNTRY RUCKUS stalked the pace into the stretch then faded. ACCURATE close up along the inside, weakened in the stretch. MARVIN'S EXPRESS was no factor. DUE TO A TIMER MALFUNCTION THE FIVE EIGHTHS TIME WAS UNAVAILABLE.

ENTRY.NAME: Marvin's Express
ENTRY.OWNER: Tooley Jennifer and Beckett Racing Team LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Cowtown Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, altered course 6path top lane, determinedly

ENTRY.NAME: Gold N Silver
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, 2 wide, took charge turn, shook clear, right urging

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 6 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BROADWAY SKY away alertly, set the pace while nicely rated, responded under mild right handed urging and won going away. TONKAWA SPRINGS stalked the early pace three wide, loomed boldly two wide into the far turn then was no match for the winner while well clear for second. ROSE'S PEPINO bore out at the start bumping TARAASHOQ, was unhurried early, got out on the far turn then finished with good courage three wide once straightened out for the drive. FLOCKED stalked the early pace, loomed boldly three wide midway on the second turn then was outfinished. PRIVATE CONNIE chased the winner around the first turn, drew closer to apply pressure two wide before a half then failed to sustain that bid. TARAASHOQ was bumped at the start then no factor. ALFIO failed to menace. DAWN WEST was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Private Connie
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 2 wide, failed to sustain bid,

ENTRY.NAME: Broadway Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, nicely rated, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Tonkawa Springs
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3wide, loomed boldly 2wide far turn, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Rose's Pepino
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out, bumped start, got out 2nd turn, finished well, 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Flocked
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed boldly 3 wide 2nd turn, outfinished
